text:
Evaluate an expression with two variables ex 7, ((3b)^2 + b) / c;  b = 4; c = 8

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { Given, } b=4 \text { and } c=8 \\\n\text { Evaluate, } \frac{(3 b)^{2}+b}{c}\n\end{array}[imath]\text { Given, } b=4 \text { and } c=8 [/imath] [imath]\text { Evaluate, } \frac{(3 b)^{2}+b}{c}[/imath]
